BasicInfo.short: EKM Metering has quickly established itself as a leading submetering hardware and services provider by offering what other companies.

Products.name: Omnimeter I v.3
Products.description: EKM OmniMeter I v.3, 3-phase, 3-wire or 4-wire, 120 to 480V, 50/60Hz Single-phase, 2 or 3-wire, 120V to 480V, 50/60 Hz

Products.name: Omnimeter Pulse v.4
Products.description: Universal kWh meter can be used on nearly any electrical system in common use and can also count pulses from up to 3 pulse-output devices.

Products.name: EKM Push
Products.description: The EKM Push Communication system is our cloud-based meter data solution that works in conjunction with our v.3 and v.4 Omnimeters.

Products.name: Omnimeter II UL v.3
Products.description: EKM OmniMeter II UL v.3 - UL and cUL Listed kWh meter for 3-phase, 3-wire or 4-wire, 120 to 240V, 50/60Hz Single-phase, 2 or 3-wire
